snippet.title: The Elder Scrolls Online: What’s New in Update 39? | gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
Find out what’s new in The Elder Scrolls Online's update 39! We sat down with Matt Firor, president of Zenimax Online Studios, to discuss ESO: Necrom’s new Arcanist class, as well as the refinements and quality of life fixes in Update 39, which is now live on PC and Mac and will be coming to consoles on September 5. Firor also talks about adjustments that make ESO less daunting for new players, the game’s upcoming 10-year anniversary, and more. The Elder Scrolls Online: Necron is available to play now.

#IGN #Gaming #ESO
